DOC.brief_summary: Prospective, multicenter study with multiple arms to examine the safety and effectiveness of the Sebacia Acne Treatment System for the treatment of acne vulgaris.
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Arm Study of Sebacia Microparticles in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis of moderate to severe acne vulgaris use of oral retinoid therapy in the past 12 months pregnancy, lactating, or planning to become pregnant excessive scarring in the treatment area, or other condition that would impact the ability to evaluate acne
